1.content:
You are sitting at the bar on the cruise ship that you and your long time girlfriend Lynsey are on, and you think this is the perfect opportunity to ask her to marry you. You then bend down on one knee before a strange light flashes from out of nowhere, and you last see your girlfriend pass out before you receive the same fate.

When you awake you are

one of your friends picks you up aggressively
The bartender sets a shot glass on you both
13.content: You wake up from your strange passing out embracing your naked blonde girlfriend. You hazily seize with her, and determine that you are an inch tall, and standing atop the bar on the cruise! It is surrounded by people as your girlfriend whispered "I'm scared." Just as on que
13.title: On top of the bar

choices: Placed you in a jar with
133.content:
A short haired blonde woman who looked as though she was in her late twenties reached over you and your girlfriend, holding a giant shot glass. She smiled as it trapped you, before scooting it and you off the bat onto her awaiting hand. She is silent as she raises you to her face, while you and Lynsey were the opposite, screaming for help.

The lady's name tag read Rachel, as you saw on the way up. She examined your bodies, and
133.title: The bartender sets a shot glass on you both

info.brief_description: You, your g/friend & 6 friends on a 3 wk cruise. You & your girlfriend shrink
info.description:
Matthew Stockbridge (you) are 21 years old and your girlfriend Lynsey Walker who is 20 have been together for 5 years. You first set eyes on her when you were at school during year 8 when you were 14.
You sent her a valentine through the class register and Lynsey was keen to find out who had sent her it.
One morning you decieded to ask her on a date and she twigged that you had sent her the valentine. She was thrilled and thought you were really sweet and instantly said yes.
You and her have been together for 5 years now and for her 21st birthday you have booked tickets on a round the world cruise. You haven't told her about it and you have also planned to ask her to marry you by buying a ring.

6 friends are also coming on the cruise and have been told to keep it a secret from Lynsey.

Onto the cruise.

During a night in the bar, you, Lynsey and your friends are sat having a few drinks when a good song comes on. Your friends go up to dance leaving you and Lynsey at the table. You think this is the perfect opportunity to ask her to marry you.
At this point something causes you and Lynsey to shrink in size, now you must survive unless you can be returned to your original size. Will you manage to ask Lynsey to marry you or will you be marrying her shrunk. Find out in this story.
